We're looking for individuals who are passionate about working in an agile, diverse, global team, who can reimagine tomorrow and deliver solutions that solve real problems.As a team, we live to take risks, push boundaries, and stretch beyond the comfort zone – with a vision to create technologies that drive human progress.Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound impact as an Interaction Designer 1 in Remote US!OVERVIEW of RoleThe Interaction Designer defines and owns user experience design deliverables across software project initiatives including ideation, user-flow analysis, wire-framing, interaction design, visual design, prototyping, branding and execution. In this role, the designer will be asked to carry products from concept to development using their abilities to distill complex problems into intuitive, clean, user friendly designs leveraging their knowledge and history with user experience concepts, creating information architectures, applying and growing existing design languages and systems, while delivering the appropriate content to development partners (workflows, behavioral specifications, redlines, interactive prototypes, etc.).Essential RequirementsBachelor’s Degree in Design or related field, completion of one (1) or more Design Internship(s) or co-op(s), and 0-3 years of interaction design experienceSubmission of portfolio link or attachment with application/resume.Proficiency with UI layout and prototyping tools like XD, Figma, and InVision Studio.
